temples.name: Tokyo Jampan Temple
temples.address: 50 W North Temple St Salt Lake City UT 84150-9709 United States
temples.services: Clothing rental available No cafeteria available Patron housing available Distribution center nearby
temples.about: This is the 20th constructed and 18th operating temple. Located in Minato, Tokyo, Japan, it was the first temple built in Asia.

temples.name: San Jose, Costa Rica Temple
temples.address: Metros Oeste de 600, Heredia Province, Belén, 40702, Costa Rica
temples.services: No clothing rental available No cafeteria available No patron housing available Distribution center nearby
temples.about: This temple is the 87th operating temple. It was announced on March 17, 1999 that a temple would be built in San José, Costa Rica.

temples.name: San Diego
temples.address: 7474 Charmant Dr, San Diego CA 92122-5000, United States
temples.services: Clothing rental available No cafeteria available No patron housing available Distribution center nearby
temples.about: This Temple is the 47th constructed and 45th operating temple. Located near the La Jolla community, it was built with two main spires, but unique to this temple are four smaller spires at the base of each main spire

temples.name: Rome Italy Temple
temples.address: Via di Settebagni 376, Rome RM, Italy
temples.services: Clothing rental available No cafeteria available Patron housing available Distribution center nearby
temples.about: This Temple is a temple of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints in Rome, Italy. The temple serves church members in Italy, as well as Malta, Greece, Cyprus, Albania and parts of Romania.
